item.title: VIM Keyboard Shortcuts Cheatsheet
item.author: Author
item.description: Introduction This post document is brief introduction about how to use VIM/VI text editor and help you remember the shortcuts. The Vim editor is a command-line based tool that’s an enhanced version of the venerable vi editor. Despite the abundance of graphical rich text editors, familiarity with Vim will help every Linux user – from an experienced system administrator to a newbie Raspberry Pi user. One important thing to note when using Vim, is that the function of a key depends on the “mode” the editor is in.
